comment.caption: Group Photo of Almy and Slichter Families
comment.note: Exterior view of family group lined up at unknown location. Identified on back left to right: Charles Almy, Curtis Thayer Almy, John Almy, Ma, Sumner, Pop, Nini and Billy Slichter, Dawn, Bill, Jr., Bill III, Chris, Joyce, and Charlie Slichter.
